modName: Black Sun Serpent Armor for Dream Girl TBBP
summary: Black Sun Serpent Armor converted for Dream Girl
descriptionHtml:
[color=#C0504D][size=3][COLOR=#C0504D][SIZE=3][B]Black Sun Serpent Armor for Dream Girl TBBP[/B][/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#9BBB59]A conversion of the super Black Sun Serpent armor by SagittariusMoon

You will need to install his [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60090/?]original CBBE version[/URL] first then overwrite with
these meshes. You will also need XPMSE 2.14 skeleton.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#FF0000]Credits:
SagittariusMoon for the [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60090/?]original[/URL] :)
Petrovich for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/?]Dream Girl[/URL]
Caliente and friends for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Outfit Studio[/URL].
techprince for [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55942/?]Zaleria Follower[/URL] used in the screenshots. [/COLOR][/size][/color]
author: dTd
